name: Draw From Earth
description:
Draw From Earth is a sci-fi voxel-style deckbuilding single player game.

Summon forces from your deck and dominate the Starboard to crush enemy fleets that block the Stargate to Earth.

Draw From Earth Features:

    • Ships of various concepts made of voxels.
    • Three selectable races and cards configured accordingly.
    • Modules that can upgrade the card.
    • Artifacts that give permanent benefit to play.
    • Starboards that provide unique battlefield effects.
